A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
***Contains Some Very Minor Spoilers***
On whole The Last Jedi was excellent. Probably the most beautifully shot Star Wars film to date. I loved the character development throughout the film and the treatment of Luke's failure as a Jedi Master allows for an actual interesting movie and sets the stage for the singular most clever and impressive display of the force in all of Star Wars. Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley\, and Adam Driver steal the show with fantastic performances.

On the nitpicky side... I thought the humor was a bit too slapsticky\, though it didn't bug me much. I thought Canto Bight could have been handled a bit better - particularly I could have done without the chase scene at the end of it - maybe something with blasters or using the Fathiers as a distraction rather than the means of escape.

Overall a super entertaining movie with some absolutely jaw dropping moments.
